abstract: UIST, pronounced "wist," stands for User Interface Software and Technology. It's the name of a research conference going on this week in Santa Barbara that showcases what's going on among computer interface researchers at top computer science departments - MIT and Stanford are a major presence - and at companies like Google, Disney and Autodesk. Standing out among the presented research, and especially relevant to news organizations, are the emerging interfaces for crowdsourcing.
